bug.author: LizardLad
bug.summary: Typo in feature matching python documentation
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => 3.2 Operating System / Platform => Linux 64 Bit Compiler => GCC
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
There is a error in the documentations grammar. In the documentation is has "more faster" in the FLANN based match detector correct grammar would be more fast or faster. <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Go to <denchmark-link:http://docs.opencv.org/trunk/dc/dc3/tutorial_py_matcher.html>http://docs.opencv.org/trunk/dc/dc3/tutorial_py_matcher.html</denchmark-link> in the sentence "It works more faster than BFMatcher for large datasets."

comments.comment: I would like to resolve this.
